void PlotMaker::getMappedColor ( double  value,
int &  red,
int &  green,
int &  blue

Returns the rgb color for the specified grey value (in range 0..1)

Parameters:
valuegrey value which should be mapped to a color (0..1)
redreturned color value (0..65535)
greenreturned color value (0..65535)
